componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Work Order is not currently associated with a Technical Elevation. To elevate this Work Order, please click the Create Technical Elevation button at the top of the Work Order.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
When the elevation is created, the Elevation team gets notified and receives notifications.


The Elevation team consists of the following members: Primary & Secondary FAS, FSE, FSM, FAM, Case Ownerâ€™s Manager, Elevation Owner & Manager, Case and Work Order Owner, Regional Elevations team RPS/DFS.


For Account Elevations, the Account Owner (TAM) is also included in the Elevation team.


Additional members can be added to the elevation as Watchers (receive notifications) or Executive Summary Key Stakeholders (do not receive notifications and is only for reporting).

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please ensure this Work Order is open and linked to a Business Issue Complaint case before elevating.

componentInstanceProperties.name: searchHint
componentInstanceProperties.value: Type a topic name and press Enter.
